name: M Package: Car Simulator
description:
Here is available new BMW M Packet car simulator for driving lovers.

Here is a lot of features that will bring you the realistic car driving emotions and you will get of full pleasant from other interesting features as well.

One of the features is a large chose of characters: there are available 11 of them and you are free to choose the driver you like the most, and that person will become your driving hero.

Another feature is the big and interesting worlds that will allow you to explore and simultaneously drift in crossroads and not only in crossroads, but also you may be sliding while you are offroading. So this worlds are perfect to enjoy real car simulator game!

These scenes will also give you the full of emotions of beautiful views.Also there is a great opportunity to test your driving skills in an online race mode, with other players and what you need to do for that is select your lovely car and race with them allowing you to get money after winning the race.

Select one of this worlds to drive and feel car simulation:
- Modern City
- Dark City
- SanFrancisco
- Winter Park

Select one of this amazing collection of cars:
- BMW X5
- BMW X5 M
- BMW 3 Series
- BMW 5 Cabriolet
- BMW Turbo 2002
- BMW 850

The BMW cars have realistic look, and the other most important feature is that you can customize the design and technical part with your needs and make the likely car that you have seen in movies.

Here is the complete list of customization features:
- Car body colors
- Wheel colors
- Glass colors
- Suspension
- Car height
- Wheel sizes and angles
- Engine
- Brakes
- Tyres
- Controls
- Assisting systems
Good luck driver! It is time to select your character and drive these amazing cars! Feel the real bmw car driving simulation!
